securitygame

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • securitygame.Node

  • public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    Node class is used for creating nodes for the network. Network class will use this class to generate nodes.
    Version:
    2014/11/01
    Author:
    Porag Chowdhury, Anjon Basak
